title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: Moving on safely the apprentice suggests making a campeth to the h'ro, which answ'r without taking thy opinion into consid'ration (as thou art only a background charact'r in
their unraveling st'ry).  That gent then declares oth'rwise - the party shalt marcheth on, rememb'ring thee existeth that gent than tells thee yond in 'rd'r to assureth thy
safety the team hast to presseth on

buttons.text: The squire shouts to the hero that he is going to the wrong direction, you support him by saying very quietly 'the hero is NEVER wrong'
The hero misses the turn, you dont stop him beacuse you still want to know what lies behind this door very very much.
